metadata.title: CVE-2017-6837 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
WAVE.cpp in Audio File Library (aka audiofile) 0.3.6 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via vectors related to alarge number of coefficients.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6837` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

audiofile-tools - 0.3.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1
libaudiofile1 - 0.3.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: audiofile package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.3.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1').
